DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect early administration tranexamic acid ( TXA ) post partum hemorrhage cause uterine atony cesarean section delivery . This randomise , placebo control trial include 74 patient . The investigator include ASA1 parturients correct haemostatic status undergo cesarean section spinal anesthesia . The randomization begin inefficacy oxytocin injection start sulprostone perfusion request surgeon . TXA Group receive 10 mg/kg tranexamic acid induction dose within 12 minute 1mg/Kg/h maintenance within 2 follow hour . Placebo Group receive volume normal saline . The investigator compare blood loss transfusion group .
DOC.brief_title: Can Tranexamic Acid Reduce Bleeding After Post Partum Hemorrhage Cesarean Section Delivery
DOC.criteria: ASA1 parturients age 20 40 correct preoperative haemostatic status ( prothrombine ratio > 60 % platelet rate > 100 000 ) , cesarean section spinal anesthesia complicate uterine atony need introduction Sulprostone abnormal placentation severe preeclampsia coagulopathy uterine rupture contra indication TXA : past history vascular occlusive event , convulsion , allergy .
